body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#158)
- Put nixos version into an environment variable. @iphydf (#157)
- Downgrade back to nixos 23.11 for now. @iphydf (#156)
- Install jdk11_headless for 500MB less storage used. @iphydf (#155)
- Upgrade to nixos 24.05. @iphydf (#154)
- Upgrade to FreeBSD 14.1. @iphydf (#153)
- Remove bazel-cache build; fix bazel build. @iphydf (#152)
- Delete GHC for android cross compiler. @iphydf (#151)
- Update github actions. @iphydf (#150)
- Add pkgsrc docker image with toxcore in it. @iphydf (#149)
- Add doxygen image. @iphydf (#148)
- Build infer from source. @iphydf (#147)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#146)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#145)
- Give buildfarm-worker enough capabilities to do sandboxing. @iphydf (#144)
- Add jdk to remote executor worker. @iphydf (#143)
- Use github actions matrix; delete some old images. @iphydf (#142)
- Upgrade nixos to 23.11. @iphydf (#141)
- Remove nacl docker image build. @iphydf (#140)
- Update alpine image in circleci. @iphydf (#139)
- Add java to `$PATH` in bazel base image. @iphydf (#138)
- Enable KVM on qemu if it's available. @iphydf (#136)
- Merge download and setup of freebsd vm. @iphydf (#134)
- Preinstall more toxcore dependencies in the s390x image. @iphydf (#133)
- Use the master id_rsa.pub. @iphydf (#132)
- Add an alpine/s390x qemu container. @iphydf (#131)
- Simplify arion-pkgs.nix, remove use of flakes. @iphydf (#130)
- Re-enable ghc image builds. @iphydf (#129)
- Re-enable some of the docker builds. @iphydf (#128)
- Use arion to build docker image for CI. @iphydf (#127)
- Give builder a "*" password so it's not locked. @iphydf (#126)
- Use alpine image instead of ubuntu for builder. @iphydf (#125)
- Use nix on ubuntu instead of a nixos image. @iphydf (#124)
- Reinstate bazel and bazel-cache images. @iphydf (#123)
- Build the toxchat/builder image on nix. @iphydf (#122)
- Add nix base image. @iphydf (#121)
- Add frama-c image. @iphydf (#120)
- Disable freebsd build for now. @iphydf (#119)
- Fix cirrus-ci haskell build. @iphydf (#118)
- Download gmp archive from gnu.org. @iphydf (#117)
- Don't create symlinks like `ghc -> $platform-ghc`. @iphydf (#116)
- Upgrade ghc base image to ubuntu 22.04. @iphydf (#115)
- Run flutter as non-root in flutter-web container. @iphydf (#114)
- Remove useless flutter upgrade command @iphydf (#112)
- chown flutter sdk to root:root. @iphydf (#111)
- Disable rust and typescript kythe extractors. @iphydf (#110)
- Update most docker images to ubuntu 22.04. @iphydf (#109)
- Use kythe 0.0.60 for the web ui. @iphydf (#108)
- Update actions/checkout from v2 to v3. @iphydf (#107)
- Upgrade build-push-action from v2 to v4. @iphydf (#106)
- No dots in github action ids. @iphydf (#105)
- Add a toolchain build for bazel 6.3.2. @iphydf (#104)
- Update to required bazel versions for buildfarm and kythe. @iphydf (#103)
- Upgrade docker actions from v1 to v2. @iphydf (#102)
- Run all restylers over the dockerfiles repo. @iphydf (#41)
- Upgrade buildfarm image to bazel 3.1.0. @iphydf (#40)
- Fix circleci config syntax error. @iphydf (#39)
- Add Dockerfile for Kythe indexer. @iphydf (#38)
- Fix typo: Codefactor -> CodeFactor @iphydf (#36)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#35)
- Fix some docker lint warnings (hadolint). @iphydf (#34)
- Use docker layer caching to speed up builds. @iphydf (#32)
- Remove dependencies from buildfarm/Makefile. @iphydf (#31)
- Fix buildfarm makefile. @iphydf (#30)
- Add bazel buildfarm dockerfiles. @iphydf (#29)
- Correctly compute the path of set-env.sh in set-env-android.sh. @iphydf (#28)
- Pass `-fllvm` to aarch64 GHC. @iphydf (#27)
- Build all code with `-fPIC`. @iphydf (#26)
- Split out android-specific env vars into ghc-android. @iphydf (#25)
- Update ghc-android build to 8.6.5. @iphydf (#24)
- Update buildfarm submodule. @iphydf (#23)
- Remove circle ci config, since it's using deprecated Circle 1.0. @iphydf (#22)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#16)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#15)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#14)
- Stop using deprecated (and now removed) "find -perm +...". @iphydf (#13)
- build on CircleCI @zoff99 (#12)
- Remove the ghc-android-hstox image build. @iphydf (#11)
- Patch nettle configure script to look for a different symbol. @iphydf (#7)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#6)
- Improve portability to older perl versions. @iphydf (#5)
- Make `find` invocation osx-compatible. @iphydf (#4)
- Add travis config. @iphydf (#3)
- Add license and some documentation. @iphydf (#2)
- Up requirements in hstox deps. @iphydf (#1)

## Features

- Add a clang-fake to the fedora image. @iphydf (#227)
- Support linux target in the qtox build scripts. @iphydf (#225)
- Add support for asan/tsan/ubsan in macOS Qt build. @iphydf (#220)
- add alpine based docker file for appimage @Green-Sky (#214)
- Add macOS Qt builder script. @iphydf (#187)
- Add builder image for fully static qtox. @iphydf (#182)
- Add qtox base image builds. @iphydf (#161)
- Add toxchat/nacl image to speed up the nacl build in c-toxcore. @iphydf (#101)
- Add bazel-cache docker image. @iphydf (#100)
- Add haskell image for use in CI builds. @iphydf (#89)
- Add flutter-web base image. @iphydf (#80)
- Make valgrind available in the bazel base image. @iphydf (#72)
- Add a toxchat/bazel image. @iphydf (#63)
- Add CompCert docker image. @iphydf (#58)
- Add FreeBSD builder image for c-toxcore CI builds. @iphydf (#53)
- Add `infer` docker image. @iphydf (#51)

## Performance improvements

- Pre-build toktok-stack haskell dependencies. @iphydf (#99)
- Use docker buildx for ghc builds. @iphydf (#85)
- Only push final Kythe tables to the kythe-tables image. @iphydf (#65)

## Bug Fixes

- Copy all the Qt imageformats, but not all kimageformats. @iphydf (#231)
- Link against nsspellchecker on macos-arm64. @iphydf (#226)
- Build ffmpeg with xcb support for desktop capture. @iphydf (#219)
- Fix qtox static linux build (for real now). @iphydf (#204)
- Rename blake2b symbols in libsodium to avoid conflict with Qt. @iphydf (#194)
- Correct cmake root path in qt macos build script. @iphydf (#190)
- Add missing deps in ubuntu-lts image. @iphydf (#189)
- Add wine32 and wine64 to the qtox windows docker images. @iphydf (#184)
- Build openssl as static library for Android. @iphydf (#172)
- Avoid empty parameters to configure in ffmpeg. @iphydf (#168)
- Set vpx target version to darwin22 on macos. @iphydf (#167)
- Fix the macos distributable build. @iphydf (#166)
- Install bash into the alpine container. @iphydf (#163)
- Fix Flutter SDK version being assumed to be 0.0.0-unknown @robinlinden (#88)
- Checkout code in toolchain build. @iphydf (#84)
- Fix build context passing in docker buildx. @iphydf (#83)
- We no longer need to patch gsasl. @iphydf (#74)
- Fix kythe webui build. @iphydf (#59)
- Put a time limit of 5 minutes for the VM to boot. @iphydf (#55)
- Fix "cat readme" at the end of ghc-android builds. @iphydf (#45)
- Disable haskell builds in kythe indexing. @iphydf (#43)

## Documentation

- Add comment to explain why we use old toxcore. @iphydf (#201)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Update pkgsrc to 2024Q4. @iphydf (#237)
- Add ninja to the FreeBSD image. @iphydf (#233)
- Build Qt for macOS 10.15. @iphydf (#236)
- Increase minimum macOS version to 10.15. @iphydf (#235)
- Add libunwind build file for linux. @iphydf (#234)
- Add qoi and sonnet to appimage and windows builders. @iphydf (#228)
- Make local development a bit easier against toxcore. @iphydf (#223)
- Upgrade to kde platform 6.8 in flatpak. @iphydf (#224)
- Add kimageformats build (for qoi support). @iphydf (#222)
- Upgrade minimum toxcore version to 0.2.14. @iphydf (#221)
- Add backends to openal-soft so we can have sound. @iphydf (#218)
- Build our own Qt 6.8.1 in the appimage build. @iphydf (#217)
- Fixes for macOS SDK 15.2. @iphydf (#216)
- Add back qmake to host-qt image. @iphydf (#213)
- Make sure all dependencies are built with optimisation flags. @iphydf (#210)
- add alsa pkgs to alpine for appimage @Green-Sky (#209)
- Upgrade to bazel 7. @iphydf (#208)
- dhcp networking @Green-Sky (#207)
- update nix to 24.11 @Green-Sky (#206)
- add file command @Green-Sky (#205)
- Fix static qtox build. @iphydf (#203)
- Also install kde platform into flatpak image. @iphydf (#202)
- Downgrade to flatpak kde platform 6.7 again. @iphydf (#200)
- Update flatpak KDE SDK version to 6.8. @iphydf (#199)
- Use an ancient toxcore in qtox alpine build. @iphydf (#198)
- Add ccache to flatpak builder. @iphydf (#197)
- Use latest OpenAL on macOS. @iphydf (#195)
- Add debug logging to toxcore built for qTox. @iphydf (#193)
- Build macOS static Qt with ubsan. @iphydf (#192)
- Add sonnet to the qtox build scripts. @iphydf (#191)
- Add option to build some qtox deps as static lib. @iphydf (#185)
- Add missing tls plugins for qTox windows build. @iphydf (#181)
- Add ccache to qtox builder images. @iphydf (#179)
- Add support for Android 7 in qTox. @iphydf (#178)
- Add armeabi-v7a builder image for qTox. @iphydf (#177)
- Add ubsan runtime library to fedora build. @iphydf (#176)
- Update to jdk17 in the docker base image. @iphydf (#175)
- Build the debug version of Qt for Android. @iphydf (#174)
- Support Android 7 (API 24). @iphydf (#173)
- Add support for macos on different architectures. @iphydf (#171)
- Add libnotify to deps in some qtox docker images. @iphydf (#169)
- Add compiler-rt to alpine build. @iphydf (#165)
- Add ninja to qtox build images. @iphydf (#164)
- Rename qtox images to all be in the same dockerhub repo. @iphydf (#162)
- Upgrade default bazel image to nixos 24.05. @iphydf (#159)
- Update buildfarm from 2.8.0 to 2.12.0. @iphydf (#160)
- Move STACK_ROOT out of HOME. @iphydf (#98)
- Split haskell image. @iphydf (#97)
- Remove version override for `network` package. @iphydf (#96)
- Install our haskell packages from git, not stack. @iphydf (#93)
- Install all toktok haskell packages into the haskell image. @iphydf (#92)
- Install additional common packages into the haskell image. @iphydf (#91)
- Install libtinfo-dev in haskell image. @iphydf (#90)
- Add msgpack to freebsd image. @iphydf (#87)
- Add msgpack to infer/compcert images. @iphydf (#86)
- Remove unused checkouts. @iphydf (#81)
- Remove android stuff from kythe buildenv. @iphydf (#79)
- Upgrade builder image to ubuntu 20.04. @iphydf (#77)
- Add sudo, gdb, ssh, and strace to the bazel image. @iphydf (#76)
- Disable freebsd build for now. @iphydf (#75)
- Don't download bazel in the bazel image. @iphydf (#71)
- Clean up kythe buildenv. @iphydf (#70)
- Add all toktok-stack system dependencies to the bazel image. @iphydf (#68)
- Add python to the builder image. @iphydf (#64)
- Disable wget spam in freebsd build. @iphydf (#62)
- Move FreeBSD image build from circleci to github actions. @iphydf (#61)
- Move cmake-freebsd-stage2 to the c-toxcore repo. @iphydf (#54)
- Upgrade to bazel 4.2.2. @iphydf (#52)
- Correct ghc version in circle ci build. @iphydf (#50)
- Fix buildfarm and kythe docker images. @iphydf (#48)
- Upgrade to ghc-8.10.7 and llvm-11. @iphydf (#47)
- Upgrade to ghc-8.10.3 and ubuntu 20.04 and ndk r23b. @iphydf (#20)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Unify Qt submodule builds for macos/win/linux. @iphydf (#232)
- Be selective about image formats in appimage as well. @iphydf (#230)
- Be more selective about Qt image format plugins. @iphydf (#229)
- Slightly nicer log messages by reducing file path length. @iphydf (#215)
- Update qtox windows builder image to Qt 6.8.1. @iphydf (#212)
- Speed up host-qt build. @iphydf (#211)
- Build Qt without OpenGL support. @iphydf (#196)
- Don't install qttools unnecessarily. @iphydf (#188)
- Remove linuxdeployqt and other unused deps. @iphydf (#186)
- Don't use cross compilation for static Qt. @iphydf (#183)
- Remove toxext stuff from qtox docker build images. @iphydf (#170)
- Remove need for pipefail. @iphydf (#82)
- Remove unused dockerfile. @iphydf (#49)
name: v0.1.0
